Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Discovery/Science
Status: New Series
Network: BBC TWO ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Mondays, Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Thursdays at 08:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: July 09, 2012

Volcano Live is an epic journey broadcast live from the world's most active volcano. The series is presented by Kate Humble and Iain Stewart.
